alert.note: Alert for Elkhart; Marshall; St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 6:25PM EDT until March 31 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Elkhart County in north central Indiana... Southeastern St. Joseph County in north central Indiana... Northern Marshall County in north central Indiana... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 625 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lakeville, or 9 miles southwest of Gulivoire Park, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... South Bend, Elkhart, Mishawaka, Goshen, Nappanee, Bremen, Dunlap, Gulivoire Park, Middlebury, Osceola, Walkerton, Wakarusa, Millersburg, Lakeville, New Paris, Benton, Locke, La Paz, Teegarden and Woodland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
